content:
I apologize for the confusion. You're right - I was having issues accessing the GitHub repository and file system. Instead of continuing to troubleshoot access issues and burning tokens, I should have asked for your assistance.

It seems I cannot directly access the GitHub repository or the local file system at C:\ai-execution-system as mentioned in your instructions. 

What would be the best way to proceed with the code audit? Some options:

1. You could upload specific key files for me to analyze (main.py, requirements.txt, PURE_AI_LANGUAGE parser implementations, etc.)

2. I could focus on analyzing the foundational documents you've already provided and create a framework for the audit that you can apply

3. You could share code snippets from the most critical components so I can evaluate them

What approach would work best for you?
